name: JOB Simulator!
description:
Welcome to the new town! 

You are a little worker who needs to be in a perfect state to work well.

Visit the pizzeria! New games in the arcade! Have some rest in the bar!

Instructions:

Walk/Drive: WASD - Arrow Keys.

Interact: Space bar.

When reaching the working goal: press X button.

This is a game made for the Mundane Jam 2021.

(pd: this is my first jam :) also, this game is meant to be continued working on)
